Reviews.Title: “An old hotel that is in desperate need of refurbishing”
Reviews.Author: rjnjjwa
Reviews.Content: stayed convenience virginia mason hospital door im guessing built 1940s relatively clean bed ok wall heater space heater faucets bathroom wash basin trickled water blasted water water floor wall noise alley hotel night morning dump trucks arrived etc served purpose convenient hospital morning medical procedure youre looking comfortable modern vacation seattle look elsewhere rate 116 night pricey hotel quality

Reviews.Title: “Great Character Find”
Reviews.Author: kristye28
Reviews.Content: friends vancouver heading seattle stay downtown pay little clean safe stay perfect spacious staff friendly location perfect smelled bit musty windows wide wasnt major clean

Reviews.Title: “If you don't mind stepping back in time to a 1920's hotel, this ones for you.”
Reviews.Author: Robin C
Reviews.Content: minute step lobby experience lobby fashioned fireplace nice woodwork elevator experience door regular swinging door groans creeks floor honest goodness real keys doors appear original oak clean bed bathrooms serviceable original fixtures air conditioning windows screens warm night wife nostalgia stay nice night decent hotel pick else
